comment:
OG 1.054 @ 70 F
Fermented @ 68 F for 6 days. 
Then let temp climb to 72 F for 3 days 
FG 1.012 @ 72 F
ABV 5.6%
Dry Hopped for 7 days. 
Turned out very good. A bit light in the mid body and could use some more hop depth.  
So next time maybe some mid caramel malt and a spicy, or herbal hop to round thing out.
